AbilityDef.label: mechskip
AbilityDef.description: A morally dubious psycast that allows one to teleport a host of plague-inducing Mechanites into a corpse. In an instant, a Burster will spring forth from the body to assault the caster's enemies. Only a fresh, non-rotted humanoid corpse will work.\n\nBursters spawned through this method will disintegrate upon death, leaving no corpse behind.

AbilityDef.label: mass mechskip
AbilityDef.description: A morally dubious psycast that allows one to teleport a host of plague-inducing Mechanites into a whole field of corpses. In an instant, Bursters will spring forth from each body to assault the caster's enemies. Only fresh, non-rotted humanoid corpses will work.\n\nBursters spawned through this method will disintegrate upon death, leaving no corpse behind. Consider keeping a fridge of corpses around?
